content: **shop special offer - 4 for 3 on all crochet & knitting patterns** click here to see all my patterns just add 4 patterns to your cart before checkout 1 »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» small pumpkin crochet pattern suitable for a beginner the pattern is written over 1 page of a4 using us terminology **pattern is available on my blog or in the ebook ** **materials** scheepjes catona cotton yarn 1 x 10g ball of rich coral #410 1 x 10g ball of caramel #506 3mm crochet hook us d/3 finished blanket size 7cm x 3cm small pumpkin crochet pattern is copyrighted to peach unicorn designs 1 http //www ravelry com/stores/peach-unicorn-designs
